items.content_html: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.
items.title: RyomenDev/google-oauth-kit: google-oauth-kit is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate microservice that provides seamless Google OAuth authentication for web applications. It allows quick implementation of Google login functionality, offering a secure, reusable solution for projects requiring user authentication through Google.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension designed to track and manage time spent on individual browser tabs. Features include real-time tab usage tracking, a user-friendly interface for viewing tab usage data, and customizable notifications to help improve productivity.

items.content_html: This repository contains a simple Count Button Project built using React and Vite, designed to demonstrate fundamental concepts of React, including state management and event handling. It is a lightweight, beginner-friendly project ideal for those looking to understand how React works in a modern development setup with Vite.

items.content_html: Bundlify is a lightweight JavaScript bundler built from scratch, designed for educational purposes. It supports static and dynamic imports, code splitting. Inspired by modern tools like Webpack and Vite, Bundlify simplifies the bundling process while providing essential features like CSS and image handling, tree shaking, and minification.

items.content_html: The Employee Management System is a web app for task management in small teams. Managers can assign tasks, and employees can mark them as completed. Built with HTML, TailwindCSS, and React.js, it uses LocalStorage to manage data locally, providing a lightweight and efficient solution.
items.title: Mayurpatel07/EMS: The Employee Management System is a web app for task management in small teams. Managers can assign tasks, and employees can mark them as completed. Built with HTML, TailwindCSS, and React.js, it uses LocalStorage to manage data locally, providing a lightweight and efficient solution.
